# Load Raw Data

Load libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library("tidyverse")
library(GEOquery)
library(readr)
```

Load raw data

```{r}
dir_create(path = "~/projects/group_14_project/_raw/")

url <- "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/download/?acc=GSE52778&format=file&file=GSE52778%5FAll%5FSample%5FFPKM%5FMatrix%2Etxt%2Egz"

destination <- "~/projects/group_14_project/_raw/GSM1275862.txt.gz"

download.file(url, destination)
```

```{r}
data <- read_delim("~/projects/group_14_project/_raw/GSM1275862.txt.gz",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data
```

```{r}
data <- read_delim("~/projects/group_14_project/_raw/GSE52778_All_Sample_FPKM_Matrix.txt",delim = " ",show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data
```
